hymn.title: God's intention in this universe is with humanity

layout.singingstanza: God's in -- ten -- tion in this u -- ni -- verse is with hu -- man -- i -- ty, So the Lord be -- came the Spir -- it just with man to min -- gled be. We re -- joice that we can all par -- take of His e -- con -- o -- my. Yes, min -- gling is the way. Min -- gle, min -- gle, hal -- le -- lu -- jah, Min -- gle, min -- gle, hal -- le -- lu -- jah, Min -- gle, min -- gle, hal -- le -- lu -- jah, Yes, min -- gling is the way!

lyrics.stanza: God's intention in this universe is with humanity, So the Lord became the Spirit just with man to mingled be. We rejoice that we can all partake of His economy. Yes, mingling is the way.
Mingle, mingle, hallelujah, Mingle, mingle, hallelujah, Mingle, mingle, hallelujah, Yes, mingling is the way!
In the center of our being, past our mind, emotion, will, Is a certain spot created to contain the Lord until By His flowing and His flooding He will all our being fill; Yes, mingling is the way.

In our daily life and all we are and do and think and say, How we need a deeper mingling just to gain the Lord each day; Lord, we give ourselves completely just to take the mingled way. Yes, mingling is the way.
From the fruit of daily living, New Jerusalem we'll see, It's the ultimate in mingling—it's divine humanity. And what joy that we can share it all, and share it corporately. Yes, mingling is the way.
